item.title: Hello, World!
item.description:
Firstly, apologies for the cliched title. I just couldn’t resist 😺.

I have lost count of the number of times I have started a blog, only for me to give up on it later. And yet, here I am, trying once again. Well, somebody smart did once say —

“The definition of insanity is doing the same thing over and over again, but expecting different results.”
